ValidationRule.description: Milestones required for NB opps stage 2
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( contains($Profile.Name, "Sales"), ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Enterprise"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "2 - Develop Opportunity"), Stage_Number__c > PRIORVALUE(Stage_Number__c),
OR( Do_they_have_a_pain_we_can_solve__c = FALSE, Start_an_eval_within_6_months__c = FALSE, E_Customer_agreed_to_begin_tech_eval__c = FALSE, F_Customer_agreed_to_mutual_plan__c = FALSE, G_Access_given_to_key_stakeholders__c = FALSE ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check milestones C, D, E, F, & G to advance to stage 2
